welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chislehurst, a charming town known for its picturesque surroundings and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to the needs of VIPs and private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals and serves a large number of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the smaller of the two terminals and primarily serves European and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for domestic and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The second newest and second largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free for up to 45 minutes, then a fee is required for longer usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southend Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal for passengers.
